Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Monroe
ShortDescription: SB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Wacker, Clark, Ida B. Wells, and State due to, street blockage near Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Wacker, Clark, Ida B. Wells, and State due to, street blockage near Monroe.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #10 Museum of Science & Industry Temporary Reroute near Monroe
ShortDescription: Update:10 Museum of Science & Industry buses temp. rerouted SB: Wacker, Clark, Ida B. Wells and State; NB: State, Adams, Dearborn and Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#10 Museum of Science & Industry buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Monroe, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Wacker, Clark, Ida B. Wells and State.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Adams, Dearborn and Wacker.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Cermak and Fullerton due to a sick customer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated lines between Cermak-Chinatown and Fullerton due to sick customer.

Train service to Howard

After stopping at Cermak-Chinatown, Howard-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Armitage (accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Fullerton and make all normal stops to Howard.

Connections can be made between 95th/Dan Ryan-bound subway service and Howard-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at State/Lake (transfer to nearby elevated station, board on Brown Line side) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

95th/Dan Ryan-bound service is not affected.
